wikipedia_page.main: Harold Ives (16 November 1904 – 23 November 1984) was a British rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1928 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1928 Summer Olympics
response: * Coxed four  Harold Ives, L G Potter, George Beaumont, O B Starkey and  Arthur Sulley - Round 1 - Seventh
